message.body: Watching college basketball doesn't sound that exciting. We can go to the Mutter museum or take a day ski trip to the Poconos with the Boeing
Wth!!! Are u not an SU alumni? We used to go to games together!
Can't make that ski trip next week. Maybe if there is one in February
The day ski trip dates are Jan 11, 25 & Feb 8, 22
